experience.title: Senior Laravel Developer
experience.description: Full-stack Laravel developer responsible for building and maintaining enterprise-grade web portals for a UK client. Delivered scalable solutions with clean, testable code and collaborated closely with product and design teams.
achievements: Designed and implemented RESTful APIs that integrated with third-party CRM platforms, reducing data-sync latency by 40%.
Built responsive admin dashboards, invoicing modules, and role-based user management systems using Laravel 8, Bootstrap, and Vue.js.
Led the migration of legacy monolithic code to a modular micro-service architecture, improving deployment frequency from monthly to weekly.
Mentored 3 junior developers, establishing code-review standards and CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions.
Integrated payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal) and built real-time notification systems using WebSockets.

experience.title: Laravel Developer
experience.description: Early-career Laravel engineer focused on rapid prototyping and feature delivery for custom web portals. Gained hands-on experience with the full Laravel ecosystem and third-party integrations.
achievements: Developed custom web portals from scratch using Laravel 5, Bootstrap, and MySQL, delivering MVPs within 3-month sprints.
Implemented secure authentication, invoicing workflows, and admin panels supporting 10,000+ daily active users.
Integrated Stripe and PayPal payment gateways and built real-time notification systems using WebSockets.
Collaborated with UI/UX designers to translate mockups into pixel-perfect, responsive front-ends.

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
education.description: Focused on software engineering principles, algorithms, and web development. Graduated with honors (Magna Cum Laude).
achievements: Led team project that won the university hackathon
Completed internship at a leading software company
